name: Tokyo Snap Demo
description:
Warning! There is a bug on Safari with saving photos.
Please use Chrome until we patch this bug.

Spend a week in Tokyo to get some great photos for your feed. Learn the latest fashion trends, make friends, and take the perfect pictures to rack up likes on Street Snaps.

If you enjoyed this demo, please support us by adding to your Steam wishlist. It improves our rankings and helps share this game with more people!
